question: Who won the gold in compound mixed pair event at the 21st Asian archery championships?
option2: Abhishek Verma and V. Jyothi Surekha
answer: Abhishek Verma and V. Jyothi Surekha
explanation: Abhishek Verma and V. Jyothi Surekha claimed the honours in compound mixed pair event to fetch India’s lone gold at the 21st Asian archery championships, which ended on November 27 with the country winning seven medals in all. The Indian duo overwhelmed Chinese Taipei’s Yi-Hsuan Chen and Chieh-Luh Chen 158-151. India ended with one gold, two silver and four bronze medals.
